name: CLARITY_EAP_3
description: The CLARITY_EAP_3 table contains basic information about the procedure records in your system. This includes both A/R and clinical procedures. This is a continuation of Clarity table CLARITY_EAP.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID number for a procedure record.

columns.name: PT_FRIENDLY_NAME
columns.description: The patient friendly procedure name for use in MyChart.
